name: Gatco 1481 Latitude II Slender Toilet Brush Holder, Chrome
short_description: From a company that’s known for outstanding quality since 1977, Gatco presents its hallmark suite, Latitude II. Coordinates with a full range of bath/shower accessories in three REMARKABLE finishes, this collection offers everything you need to reimagine your bathroom Superb quality resonates from this hand polished, HAND CRAFTED contemporary toilet brush and holder made of premium stainless-steel ensuring durability, dependability, and resistance to rust, corrosion, and scratching Add flair to your bathroom with its freestanding compact design, featuring an anti-scratching acrylic base- requiring no assembly or installation. Hygienic construction includes a removable plastic insert for easy cleaning, secure odor-proof enclosure, no-drip scrubber head, and watertight brush storage container. Incorporates course black brush bristles, sturdy weighted metal handle, and splash guard for a seamless cleaning experience. Available in a variety of finishes including- chrome, satin nickel, and matte black.
product_description: From a company with over 40 years of experience in quality luxury bathware, we present our modern slim toilet bowl brush and holder set. Only the highest quality handcrafted stainless steel and acrylic are used to ensure longevity of your product for a lifetime. Ergonomically designed weighted grip and dark brush bristles combine both functionality and style. Engineered with hygiene as a priority, we have integrated features such as a removable insert for cleaning, water locked lid, splash guard, and a low moisture retaining brush head, to keep your bathroom to the highest sanitary standards. This brush is perfect for your home, apartment, condo, office, or RV. Choose from a variety of our most popular finishes and styles. To ensure your complete satisfaction..
